document_data.caption: ''The location of Asple on the [[Vilhon Reach]].''
document_data.mainbody: '''Asple''' was a small fishing community on the north-western shores of the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Geography: Asple was nestled on the east most edge of the [[Aphrunn Mountains]], on the shores of the Vilhon Reach and to the south of the island of [[Iligh√¥n]].
document_data.Trade: Even though Asple's main production was [[fish]], the town also housed a rich and prosperous [[stone]] quarry that supplied the Reach. The town of Asple also attracted industrious adventurers in search of old sunken ships flush with treasures as the local fishers were quite knowable on the matter.
document_data.History:
Asple was settled on the north-western shores of the Vilhon Reach in [[50 DR]], during the period of fast expansion and settlement of the region.

As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Asple remain an independent city-state, mostly due to lack of attention from its neighbors. However, the town posed little danger and was an easy target for a takeover.
